newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian castor futures market closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: Indian castor futures market closed for holiday.

text.p: The Bombay Oilseeds and Oils Exchange, which conducts futures trading in castorseed, was closed on Thursday for a holiday.
On Wednesday, castorseed June delivery ended at 1,122/1,123 rupees per quintal, off the day's high of 1,133/1,135 but up from Tuuesday's closing 1,112/1,113, traders said.
The exchange officially opened castorseed September delivery but no deal had yet taken place, traders said.
Groundnut oil dropped to 358/359 rupees per 10 kg from 362/363 rupees on increased summer crop arrivals.
They said stockists were active sellers on expectations of higher arrivals of imported palm-oil and imported sunflower oil at the Bombay port in the short term.
Imported palm-oil fell to 284/285 rupees per 10 kg from 290 rupees.
In Rajkot, spot groundnut oil fell 5 rupees at 555 rupees per 15 kg.
